profileTitle: PavéPRO, Your Trusted Partner for Expert Pressure Washing
profileText: We specialize in professional pressure washing for residential, commercial, and industrial properties. From driveways and parking lots to storefronts and large industrial surfaces, we clean, restore, and protect with detailed, attentive care. Our services include pressure washing, paver sanding, and sealing: all designed to keep your property looking its absolute best.

tab1.title: 1st Step
tab1.description: Thorough cleaning followed by sand filling and sealant application to enhance the appearance and durability of your paving stones.

tab2.title: 2nd Step
tab2.description: Leveling and depth adjustment of paving stones to correct imperfections and restore structural integrity and surface aesthetics.

tab3.title: 3rd Step
tab3.description: Cleaning of large concrete surfaces and other exterior areas requiring special attention.

reviews.name: John G.
reviews.content: I hired PavéPRO last summer to pressure wash my driveway. Flexible and reliable. I’ll definitely be using them again in the future!

reviews.name: Charles
reviews.content: Reliable and highly effective. Very satisfied with the results. Thanks!

reviews.name: Majd A.
reviews.content: Best pressure washing business in town great prices and great service
